trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Harleysville
There were no other sightings in Harleysville on or around May 11th 2009
Summary: A bright light crossing the sky slowly, no deviation in the light whatsoever, no sound.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was approx 8pm Monday evening, noticed a bright light in the sky, at first I thought it was a plane, as we have plenty of air traffic, but I noticed the light was very bright and it seemed close. As it passed, I thought I would hear a sound but nothing, I also noticed that the light never changed, it stayed constant even though I saw the object coming towards my direction, passing overhead and then moving off away from me. It pretty much followed a straight line, as it was moving off, we had some cloud cover and it seemed to pass through a cloud. I've never seen a plane with a constant light unless it was heading towards or away from me. I usually see with planes a bright light as it heads towards then generally you will see some type of blinking as it passes overhead. It was strange, but I can't say it was a UFO, only that it was odd the way it passed. Based on how bright the light was I thought it was closer to the ground than most planes fly and I was confused because it made no sound and didn't seem to travel all that fast.
